channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- True Image
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- True Image

item.title: CVE-2020-10140|2024-08-04T10:50:57.928Z -- acronis -- true%20image
item.description: Acronis True Image 2021 fails to properly set ACLs of the C:\ProgramData\Acronis directory. Because some privileged processes are executed from the C:\ProgramData\Acronis, an unprivileged user can achieve arbitrary code execution with SYSTEM privileges by placing a DLL in one of several paths within C:\ProgramData\Acronis.
